AMECard.Name: Low-level visual descriptor extraction
AMECard.Definition: Extract desriptors representing visual features of single frames or a group of frames (e.g. MPEG-7 dominant color, accent color, amount of motion color layout etc.)

Input.Name: Others
Input.Comment: parameters depend on the descriptor to be extracted, in this case how far should we mention? Is there any good descriptive solutions for this problem?

Output.Name: Others
Output.Comment: Detected descriptor tends to have its own structual data such a timepoint, timedutaion, region of interest.... How can we handle this?
